EmailTemplate.name: 201909_Americas_Primus Elite_kcr.201910_Americas_Flightstar_PrimusElite_Email_4_
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to save on Primus Elite and MSP plans!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Frustrated by failures and exchange costs? Stop supporting your Lear 40/45 with DU-870 spares that have a limited life span and are not supported under the Honeywell MSP Plan. Instead, improve your vision and add instant value to your aircraft by upgrading to Honeywell DU-875 LCD displays and Primus Elite with Flightstar, and take advantage of these great offers:
Upgrade Path Incentives
One for One Upgrade
- 12-month warranty - $35,000 Honeywell trade-in credit per display replaced - $2,500 discount on Honeywell MSP contract per display unit (on new or extended MSP contract)
Primus Elite Enhanced Features
- 12-month warranty - Up to $140,000 in Honeywell trade-in credits - Receive your first year of Honeywell MSP coverage free of charge - $10,000 off regular MSP contract price for the second and third year
Don't forget, these offers are only good through December 31, 2019, so act now!
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/flightstar-primus-elite.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_flightstar_du875]]>
